PGon¶

class decodes.core.dc_pgon.PGon(vertices=None, basis=None)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_has_pts.HasPts

a very simple 2d polygon class Polygons limit their vertices to x and y dimensions, and enforce that they employ a basis. Transformations of a polygon should generally be applied to the basis. Any tranfromations of the underlying vertices should ensure that the returned vectors are limited to x and y dimensions

eval(t)¶

evaluates this polygon at the specified parameter t a t-value of 0 will result in a point conincident with PGon.pts[0] a t-value of 1 will result in a point conincident with PGon.pts[-1]

inflate(rotation=0.5)¶

returns a polygon inscribed inside this one. each vertex of the returned polygon will lie on the midpoint of one of this polygon’s edges

optionally, you may set the rotation 0->1
